name: .DIY File Extension
summary: Learn about .DIY files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: File created by My Drivers, a program used for backing up and restoring Windows drivers; saved in a rich text format and contains the name of the driver as well as other parameters used for the backup; saved alongside other backup files and used in the driver restoration process.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
